description:
Flora`s Gothitelle participated in the Isshu League Higaki Tournament. In the third round it was matched up against Virgil`s Umbreon where it was defeated and as a result Flora was eliminated from the tournament.
It is unknown if Flora`s Gothorita is the same Pok√©mon in its evolved state as it was not revealed in the series. None of Flora`s Gothitelle moves are known as a result.
name: Gothiruselle (Flora)
